name: Hurry Up Snake
description:
Hurry Up! Snake

This is the first game developed after learning Unity.

Press the move button or WSAD keys to avoid obstacles and eat food within the time limit.

【Game Introduction】

- Avoid obstacles by pressing the up(W)▲/down(S)▼/left(A)◀/right(D)▶ movement buttons and eat food🍚 within the time limit⏱.

- Aim for stage 345 and challenge for the highest score🏆.

- The language of the game is Korean🇰🇷/English🇺🇸. It can be changed by pressing the button.

【Home Screen Description】

- Play🎮 - A total of 345 stages are provided, and you can start from stage 1 and repeat the completed stage at any time.

- Easy🙂/Normal😐/Hard🙁 - Difficulty and time limit⏱: Easy is given 40 seconds🕒, Normal is 30 seconds🕑, and Hard is 20 seconds🕜.

- Player - You can set the player's face🦲 and color🟥🟧🟨🟩🟦🟪. Some🔒 faces can be obtained by completing🔓 certain stages.

- Sound🎵 - You can hear various sounds/effects during the game.

- Music🎶 - You can listen to exciting music while playing the game.

- Vibrate📳 - The snake vibrates when it hits an obstacle or eats prey.

- Language(flag)🏴 - We provide two languages: Korean🇰🇷/English🇺🇸.

【Game Progress】

- If you press the play🎮 button, the stage selection screen appears, and you can proceed from stage 1.

- A snake's🐍 life❤️ starts with the first five.

- If you eat all the numbers from 1 to 9, you will be moved to the next stage.

- If you hit💥 an obstacle or the body of a stake🐍, your life❤️ is reduced by 1, and when it reaches 0, the game is over.

- Completed🔓 stages can be selected and redone at any time.

- You can get Star★ +1 only when you first complete the maze-type stage every 5 rounds. (However, if you complete the stage marked with *, you can repeatedly get Star +1.)

- If you earn a star★, you can continue🔜 (keep score) at the end of the game.

- You will get +1 Life❤️ every time you complete a 5 round stage.

【Stage composition】

- Stages 2 through 98 are made of 1 to 21 lines─.

- In stages 99 to 142, English (alphabet) comes out, the corresponding English (alphabet) is read, and the Korean interpretation of English words is also read.

- In stages 143 to 204, Korean (Hangul) comes out, the corresponding Korean (Hangul) is read, and the English interpretation of Korean words is also read.

- From stage 132 to 142, try I LOVE YOU, THANK YOU, I'm HAPPY, I'm SORRY, I MISS YOU to convey your heart to the other person.

- From stages 178 to 204, use I Love You, Thank You, I'm Happy, Congratulations, I'm Sorry, I Miss You to convey your feelings to the other person.

- Stages 206 to 243 are made of several squares■ of different sizes.

- Stages 244 to 345 are made of 1 square■. (The difficulty increases gradually)

【Game Over】

- Game tips appear randomly.

- You can check the current stage, current score, and the current number of stars★.

- You can check the highest stage, the highest score of the current difficulty.

- Home🏠 - Go to the home screen.

- Stage Select▦ - You can check stages 1 to 345, and you can select the completed🔓 stage again at any time. Locked🔒 stage cannot be executed

- Replay🔁 - You can restart the stage you last finished. On restart, the score starts at 0.

- Continue🔜(1 Star★ Required) - You can resume the last stage you finished. It starts with the score at the end of the game.
